alert.note: Alert for Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 5:22AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Chicot and western Washington Counties through 545 AM CST... At 522 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Parkdale, or 8 miles west of Eudora, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Eudora and Chicot Junction around 530 AM CST. Lake Village around 535 AM CST. Wayside around 540 AM CST. Greenville and Winterville around 545 AM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CST for southeastern Arkansas...northeastern Louisiana...and northwestern Mississippi.
